Title: Relates to obligations with respect to contracts with business enterprises which employ individuals with disabilities
Summary: Relates to obligations with respect to contracts with business enterprises which employ individuals with disabilities; defines qualified business enterprise as any business concern which employs a workforce consisting of at least fifteen percent employees with disabilities and has been certified under this section; sets goal of five percent of state contracts going to qualified business enterprises; establishes an office of statewide advocate, certification process, and enforcement mechanism.
LawCode: Add ยง139-m, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to obligations with respect to contracts with business enterprises which employ individuals with disabilities
